title: Israeli Salad
ingredients: 4ripe but firm medium tomatoes, cut into ½-inch (1.5 cm) chunks, or 1 pint (455 g) sweet cherry tomatoes, halved
3Persian cucumbers, cut into ½-inch (1.5 cm) chunks
½large or 1 small red bell pepper, cored and cut into ½-inch (1.5 cm) chunks
1medium carrot, cut into ½-inch (1.5 cm) dice
2tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley and/or mint
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Put the tomatoes, cucumbers, bell pepper, carrot, onion, parsley, and/or mint in a large salad bowl and toss with the lemon juice and oil. Season with the sumac. Taste and season with salt and black pepper. Serve right away.
